name: Brutal Rush
description:
The game where you survive hordes of zombies - against your friends!

You play solo or with up to 4 players as you try to survive increasingly difficult waves and build defenses while sabotaging your opponents and making the most amount of kills possible! The last one to die wins.

The game is meant to play with XBox One controllers, but you can play alone with the keyboard.

Controls:

XBox One controller: Written on screen as you play!

Keyboard:

Move: WASD

Aim: Arrow keys

Place boxes: F

Shoot: Left shift

Have fun playing our game!

Credits:

Programming: Mattys Gervais, Simon Bouchard, Raphaël Dallaire, Thomas Bergeron, Antoine Tremblay-Simard

Graphics: Angélique Dubé

Music & SFX: Thomas Bergeron
